希.definition: to hope; to admire; variant of 稀[xi1]

希仁.definition: Xiren, courtesy title of Bao Zheng 包拯[Bao1 Zheng3] (999-1062), Northern Song official renowned for his honesty

希伯來書.definition: Epistle of St Paul to the Hebrews

希伯萊.definition: variant of 希伯來|希伯来[Xi1bo2lai2]

希夏邦馬峰.definition: Mt Shishapangma or Xixiabangma in Tibet (8012 m)

希律王.definition: Herod the Great (73 BC - 4 BC), Roman-appointed king of Judea (37-4 BC)

希拉蕊.definition: Taiwan equivalent of 希拉里[Xi1 la1 li3]

希拉里.definition: Hillary (name); Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician

希拉里·克林頓.pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4
希拉里·克林頓.definition: Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician

希望.definition: to hope; a hope; a wish (CL:個|个[ge4])

希格斯.definition: Higgs (name); Peter Higgs (1929-), British theoretical physicist, one proposer of the Higgs mechanism or Higgs boson to explain the mass of elementary particles

希格斯玻色子.pinyin: Xi1 ge2 si1 bo1 se4 zi3

希沃特.definition: sievert (Sv), unit of radiation damage used in radiotherapy

希波克拉底.definition: Hippocrates (c. 460 BC - c. 370 BC), Greek physician, father of Western medicine

希洪.definition: Gijón (Asturian: Xixón), city in northwest Spain on the bay of Biscay

希爾.definition: Hill (name); Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs

希神.definition: Greek mythology; abbr. for 希臘神話|希腊神话[Xi1 la4 shen2 hua4]

希舒美.definition: Zithromax (brand name for the antibiotic azithromycin 阿奇霉素[a1qi2mei2su4])

希蒙·佩雷斯.definition: Shimon Peres (1923-2016), Israel politician, prime minister in 1977, 1984-1986 and 1995-1996, president 2007-2014, recipient of the Nobel Peace Prize 1994

希西家.definition: Hezekiah or Ezekias (740-687 BC), twelfth king of Judah (Judaism)
